review_data.title: Some of the staff members were very rude
review_data.content: I have been a regular customer at the Chez Toni bistro. Two of the staff members generally seem to be very unfriendly, especially against students. The location and food are nice and the meal comes at a reasonable price. The cooks that prepare and serve...More

review_data.title: Guter Kaffee, schönes Lokal, aber........
review_data.content: Morgens z,T. lange Wartezeiten auf einen Kaffee (heute Vormittag 10 Min.) - Personal seeeeeehr langsam........ Da ist unsere Kaffeepause (extern)...More

review_data.title: University cafe
review_data.content: Food there is inexpensive but not bad, exactly what you expect from University cafeteria, they also focus on healthy choices. Portions are not big, but nothing bad about it. Nice outside seating, lots of students hanging there... I think it serves its purpose.

review_data.title: Essen genial, Kaffee perfekt
review_data.content: Vor dem Besuch im Museum eine kleine Stärkung: Chez Toni ist das ein Genuss. Der Kaffee ist perfekt, die Bedienung...More

review_data.title: Kaffee top
review_data.content: Ich muss ehrlich sein, ich hab bis jetzt hier nur Kaffee getrunken. Sind fein und günstig. Mitarbeiter sehr freundlich. Sitzgelegenheiten...More

review_data.title: Cafe in partnership with the University
review_data.content: Bistro Chez Toni is located at Toni Areal and you can use public transit Tram #4 to access. The staff is efficient, though not the most friendly. The place has sidewalk seating on each side of the building. Inside, there are a couple of bar...More

review_data.title: Okay, breakfast offering spotty
review_data.content: Pastries were very dry but the coffee was okay. Pretty cheap considering Zurich. Looked popular with students.

review_data.title: Good linch
review_data.content: Spotless and excellent ambience. Long tables to share and seating outside. I had a great began sandwich and a muesli with berries. expressing here is excellent and prices are fair

review_data.title: Nice Cafe/Restaurant
review_data.content: It is a nice Cafe Restaurant located not far from Toni Areal Museum of Design. It is bit far from town center, but worth visiting if in this area.

review_data.title: Nice coffee and good price
review_data.content: I usually stop for breakfast Chez Toni. The coffee is quote good compared to other places in the area. Prices are quite good for Zurich.

review_data.title: Moderne Urbanität inmitten kunstreicher Industriebrachen
review_data.content: Das ehemalige Yoghurt-Reich Toni ist ein Mekka der Kunststudierenden und Designfreaks geworden. Dass sich dort auch eine variantenreiche Gastronomie angesiedelt...More
